original_title: Robin Gibb - In Concert with the Danish National Concert Orchestra
overview: This concert with the Danish National Concert Orchestra was filmed at Ledreborg Castle in Denmark in summer 2009. Robin performs a “greatest hits” set covering classic Bee Gees and solo numbers. The orchestra is augmented by Robin’s band, and the combination of Robin and the talented musicians produce a special and unique concert
title: Robin Gibb - In Concert with the Danish National Concert Orchestra
